name: Coq au Vin
description: Chicken cooked in red wine, typically served with mushrooms, onions, and bacon

name: Beef Bourguigno(serves four)
description: Beef stewed in red wine, typically served with carrots, onions, and mushrooms.

name: Cassoulet
description: A fish stew originating from Provence, typically made with a variety of fish and shellfish, tomatoes, and herbs.

name: Confit De Canard
description: Duck leg cooked in its own fat and served with a variety of sides such as roasted potatoes or green beans.

name: Souffl√©
description: A light and airy savory or sweet dish made from egg yolks and whites and a variety of ingredients.

name: Ratatouille
description: A stewed vegetable dish, typically made with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, and herbs.

name: Tarte Tatin(10 tarts, 4.2 oz each)
description: A French sweet pastry made by caramelizing sugar with butter, then adding apples and topping with pastry crust.

name: Quiche
description: A savory custard tart filled with cheese, vegetables, or meat.
